products.name: Premium Coffee
products.shortDescription: High-grade Arabica and Robusta beans sourced from premium plantations
products.fullDescription: Our premium coffee beans are carefully selected from the finest plantations, ensuring exceptional quality and rich flavor profiles. Available in various grades and roast levels.

products.name: Premium Tea
products.shortDescription: Finest black, green, and specialty teas from renowned estates
products.fullDescription: Our tea selection includes premium black tea, green tea, and specialty blends. Each variety is carefully processed to preserve its natural aroma and health benefits.

products.name: Macadamia Nuts
products.shortDescription: Premium quality macadamia nuts, whole and processed
products.fullDescription: Our macadamia nuts are known for their superior quality, rich flavor, and high nutritional value. Available in various sizes and processing levels.

products.name: Fresh Avocados
products.shortDescription: Premium Hass and Fuerte avocados for export markets
products.fullDescription: High-quality fresh avocados, carefully harvested and packed to maintain freshness during transit. Ideal for international markets.

products.name: Export Bananas
products.fullDescription: Fresh, premium-grade bananas harvested at optimal maturity for long-distance shipping. Consistent quality and size.

products.name: Sesame Seeds
products.shortDescription: White and black sesame seeds, premium grade
products.fullDescription: High-quality sesame seeds with excellent oil content and purity. Available in white, black, and natural varieties.

products.name: Sunflower Seeds
products.shortDescription: Premium sunflower seeds for oil extraction and consumption
products.fullDescription: High-oil content sunflower seeds, perfect for oil production or direct consumption. Consistently high quality.

products.name: Chia Seeds
products.shortDescription: Organic chia seeds rich in omega-3 fatty acids
products.fullDescription: Premium organic chia seeds packed with nutrients, omega-3 fatty acids, and fiber. Perfect for health-conscious markets.

products.name: Ceylon Cinnamon
products.shortDescription: True Ceylon cinnamon sticks and powder
products.fullDescription: Authentic Ceylon cinnamon known for its delicate flavor and aroma. Available in sticks, powder, or custom processing.

products.name: Black Pepper
products.shortDescription: Premium whole and ground black pepper
products.fullDescription: High-quality black pepper with strong aroma and pungency. Available whole or ground to specification.

products.name: White Pepper
products.shortDescription: Premium white pepper for refined cuisines
products.fullDescription: Finest white pepper with a milder, more complex flavor profile. Ideal for light-colored dishes and refined cooking.

products.name: Dried Chillies
products.shortDescription: Various dried chilli varieties for global markets
products.fullDescription: A range of dried chillies from mild to extremely hot. Carefully dried and sorted for consistent quality.

products.name: Green Cardamom
products.fullDescription: High-grade green cardamom with intense aroma and flavor. One of the world's most expensive spices.

products.name: Turmeric
products.fullDescription: High-curcumin content turmeric, prized for its health benefits and vibrant color. Available as whole roots or powder.

products.name: Vanilla Beans
products.fullDescription: Finest quality vanilla beans with rich, complex flavor profiles. Carefully cured for maximum flavor development.

products.name: Whole Cloves
products.shortDescription: Premium whole cloves with intense aroma
products.fullDescription: High-quality whole cloves with strong aromatic properties. Essential for spice blends and culinary applications.
